WorkItem.Description:
I installed WPP.  I sorted out the server/console version issue.  The next step is a set a certificate.  I click "Generate the certificate" and it tells me it was successful.  However, the "Save the certificate" button is not available.

I'm running WPP from a 64-bit Windows 7 computer.  WSUS runs on a Server 2003 R2 Standard Edition SP2 computer.

Comments.Message: Never mind.  I got out of the WPP console, went back in and this time the button was available.  Moving on to the next step...
Yes, effectively, there is a bug in the UI. The Save button does become available after a successfull generation of the certificate.
